statements: SELECT * FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT press_release_id, sentiment_score FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE press_release_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE trading_strategy = 'Bullish' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT press_release_id, trading_strategy FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY trading_strategy ASC;
SELECT * FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY press_release_id DESC;
SELECT press_release_id, sentiment_score, trading_strategy FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE trading_strategy = 'Technical Analysis' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE trading_strategy LIKE '%Analysis%' ORDER BY press_release_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 AND trading_strategy IN ('Fundamental Analysis', 'Quantitative Analysis') ORDER BY trading_strategy, sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT press_release_id, sentiment_score, trading_strategy FROM press_release_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM PressReleases
SELECT id, title FROM PressReleases WHERE release_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT title, content FROM PressReleases WHERE id = 5
SELECT id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM SentimentAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT release_date, sentiment_score FROM PressReleases PR JOIN SentimentAnalysis SA ON PR.id = SA.release_id WHERE PR.id = 3
SELECT * FROM PressReleases WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01' AND title LIKE '%announcement%' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, content FROM PressReleases WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id;
SELECT release_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM SentimentAnalysis GROUP BY release_id HAVING COUNT(release_id) >= 2 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM PressReleases WHERE content LIKE '%important%' OR content LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY release_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, release_date FROM PressReleases WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PressReleases ORDER BY date_published DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, content FROM PressReleases WHERE date_published > '2022-01-01'
SELECT sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM TradingStrategies WHERE id = 'a30b3d70-5e8e-45a5-8ef4-0e1b5c2d2ef5'
SELECT * FROM TradingStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM PressReleases JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON PressReleases.id = SentimentAnalysis.press_release_id WHERE SentimentAnalysis.sentiment_score > 0.5;

SELECT PressReleases.date_published, SentimentAnalysis.sentiment_score, TradingStrategies.strategy_name FROM PressReleases LEFT JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON PressReleases.id = SentimentAnalysis.press_release_id INNER JOIN TradingStrategies ON TradingStrategies.id = SentimentAnalysis.id;

SELECT PressReleases.content, TradingStrategies.strategy_name FROM PressReleases JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON PressReleases.id = SentimentAnalysis.press_release_id JOIN TradingStrategies ON SentimentAnalysis.id = TradingStrategies.id WHERE TradingStrategies.strategy_name LIKE '%momentum%';
SELECT P.content, SA.sentiment_score FROM PressReleases AS P JOIN SentimentAnalysis AS SA ON P.id = SA.press_release_id ORDER BY SA.sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT P.date_published, TS.strategy_name, SA.sentiment_score FROM PressReleases AS P JOIN SentimentAnalysis AS SA ON P.id = SA.press_release_id JOIN TradingStrategies AS TS ON SA.id = TS.id ORDER BY P.date_published DESC, SA.sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM PressReleases;
SELECT title, sentiment_score FROM PressReleases WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM TradingStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT release_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT trader_name, position, portfolio_value FROM Traders WHERE portfolio_value > 100000 ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM PressReleases WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM PressReleases WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM TradingStrategies WHERE buy_indicator = true;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT trader_name, portfolio_value FROM Traders ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM press_releases
SELECT title, content FROM press_releases WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT id, title FROM press_releases WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM press_releases WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, release_date ASC
SELECT title FROM press_releases WHERE title LIKE '%announcement%'
SELECT * FROM press_releases WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT title, content FROM press_releases WHERE title LIKE '%announcement%' OR title LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY release_date ASC
SELECT id, title, release_date FROM press_releases WHERE content LIKE 'Important%' OR content LIKE 'Breaking%' ORDER BY title DESC
SELECT * FROM press_releases WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, release_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, title, sentiment_score FROM press_releases WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 20
